value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Listen up, everyone! We're officially
in a state of emergency! This is not
a drill!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|State of emergency? Is it already that
time of year? She always gets like this
around festivals...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|This has nothing to do with the
festival! The Order of Heroes is
running dangerously low on rations.$k$pAt this rate, each of us will be
allowed just a single mouthful of food
a day!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|A single mouthful? How did things
get so bad?$k$pAnd how did you calculate down to
each Hero's individual mouth size?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|There's no time to explain, Alfonse!
Castle repairs have used up too much
of our budget for this month.$k$pWe need a plan, and quick. If we
don't find a way to feed ourselves for
the rest of the month, we'll starve!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|We won't starve, Commander. We'll
be fine. The harvest festival has
begun, so let's all go together!$k$pIt'll at least take our minds off this
ration shortage for a little while.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The harvest festival, huh? Isn't that
the one where people give us candy
just for saying "trick or treat"?$k$p$EFace_Cool|These are desperate times...and
sacrifices must be made. We have no
choice but to survive on candy alone!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Uh... Yeah... Well, there will be things
other than candy...like pumpkins!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|All right! This tournament will be the
perfect chance to find a sworn rival.
I wonder who it'll be...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_F_Halloween18,Face|Um, h-hello... May I have some can—
I mean... Trick or trea— N-no, never
mind... It's OK.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|Huh? I didn't realize kids were
allowed to join the tournament... Is
this against the rules?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_F_Halloween18,Face|I'm not a child... I just like candy...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|Not a child, huh? Oh, I get it! You're
in costume, too. You're not a kid—
you're a monster!$k$pWell, it's a very nice costume, so
here—have some candy! So just how
old are you, huh?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_F_Halloween18,Face|Oh, thank you! *munch* I'm, um... I
guess I'm about...1,200 years old?
Roughly.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|That's hilarious—1,200 years old? I
guess cute little monsters have really
long lifespans, huh?$k$p(Gosh, I shouldn't just leave a kid like
this all alone...) Say, how about we
partner up for this tournament?$k$pAnd, hey, you too! Yeah, the one
hiding in the shadows over there!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_Halloween18,Face|I am a ninja. I prefer to remain
hidden.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|Isn't it tough to stay hidden dressed
like a maid? Don't people keep giving
you their drink orders?$k$pCome on, our opponents are here.
Let's go!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロカゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_Halloween18,Face|We must retreat for now... For the
sake of the mission.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|Oof, you guys sure are strong. Let's
do this again, all right? One of you
may be my rival!$k$p$Sbs150|
